name: Fold a Bike by Green Mile
description:
This graphical prototype of an app was created as part of the GlobalXChanges-Challenge 2021 at the University of Apllied Sciences Munich. (https://www.hm.edu/allgemein/kooperationen_transfer/globalxchangeschallenges/) Deutsche Bahn Connect was the challenge giver, which is the reason the DB label is worked into the prototype. That's the only actual connection this project had with a market player.


Therefore, the whole app is fictional and not supported by any displayed companies. Any implemented links were last visited November 2021 an were connecting the user to a homepage of a bike manufacturer.
